name: market for wastewater from textile production | wastewater from textile production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20268/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is a market dataset for wastewater from the textile industry. It connects the producting activity of this wastewater with the datasets treating it. Therefore, there is no transportation considered in this market.

Starts with the supply of wastewater from the datasets producing it.

Ends with the provision of the wastewater from the textile industry to its treatment/disposal consumption mix.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/37:Sewerage/370:Sewerage/3700:Sewerage
